name: Marioo
description: '''Omary Ally Mwanga''' (born December 31, 1995), known professionally as '''Marioo''', is a Tanzanian singer, songwriter, and music producer. He is known for songs such as "Tete", "Dunia", and "Nairobi" (featuring Kenyan artist [[Bien-Aim√© Baraza|Bien]] of [[Sauti Sol]]), which recorded high streaming numbers across major digital platforms in Tanzania and Kenya, and was associated with Marioo's increased visibility in the East African music scene.
